DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF ; RWANDA ; REBELS NEAR ARMY STRONGHOLD IN CAPITAL
DOC.TEXT: Battered government soldiers fought fiercely to stall a rebel advance in the capital , Kigali , that threatened a key army stronghold near the airport.The rebels have attacked Kigali along several fronts over the past week with artillery , mortars and infantry . But they have focused their efforts on the base on the city ' s outskirts defended by three government battalions . The camp would give the rebels control of the airport .
